history.proof: intros a la ls. induction la. + simpl. qsimpl use: pl_ess_aux_1. + simpl. apply le_n_S. qsimpl use: pl_ess_aux_1,taille_aux_0.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, a0 : ad la1, la2, ls : prec_list IHla1 : S (pl_card ls) <= pl_card (prec_cons a la1 ls) IHla2 : S (pl_card ls) <= pl_card (prec_cons a la2 ls) Unable to unify "S (pl_card ?M1856) <= pl_card (prec_cons ?M1855 ?M1856 ?M1857)" with "S (pl_card ls) <= S (S (pl_card la1 + pl_card la2 + pl_card ls))".
In environment a : ad ls : prec_list Unable to unify "S (taille_0 ?M1949) <= taille_0 (prec_cons ?M1948 ?M1949 ?M1950)" with "pl_card ls <= S (pl_card ls)".

original: intros a la ls. induction la. + simpl. apply pl_ess_aux_1. + simpl. apply le_n_S. apply taille_aux_0.
